title: XBRL UTR ghg Emissions Item Type units (2024-10-22)
description: Valid units for ghgEmissionsItemType as defined in the XBRL Units Type Registry

anyOf.title: Metric tonnes of CO2 equivalent
anyOf.description: Carbon dioxide equivalent is calculated for emissions other than carbon dioxide according to their global warming potential (GWP). As estimates of GWP may change over time, the UTR defines no fixed conversion rates
